name: Command
description: You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn according to the option you choose (Approach, Drop, Flee, Grovel, or Halt).
higherLevels: You can affect one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

effects.description: On a failed save, the target follows the one-word command on its next turn.

controlOptions.name: Approach
controlOptions.details: Target moves toward you by the shortest route on its turn.

controlOptions.name: Drop
controlOptions.details: Target drops what it is holding, then ends its turn.

controlOptions.name: Flee
controlOptions.details: Target spends its turn moving away from you by the safest route.

controlOptions.name: Grovel
controlOptions.details: Target falls prone and ends its turn.

controlOptions.name: Halt
controlOptions.details: Target does nothing and stands in place.
